mapper.insert: insert into project_test.words (date, word, likes) VALUES (#{date},#{word},#{likes})
mapper.delete: delete from project_test.words where word_id = #{id} collate utf8mb4_bin
delete from project_test.words where word = #{word} collate utf8mb4_bin
mapper.update: update project_test.words set word = #{word},date = #{date},likes = #{likes} where word_id = #{id} collate utf8mb4_bin;
mapper.select: select * from project_test.words where word_id = #{id} collate utf8mb4_bin
select * from project_test.words where word = #{name} collate utf8mb4_bin
mapper.update: update project_test.words set likes = likes+1 where word = #{word} collate utf8mb4_bin
mapper.select: select * from project_test.words where likes > #{likes} order by rand() collate utf8mb4_bin limit #{limits} ;
select word_id from project_test.words where word = #{word} collate utf8mb4_bin
